item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, January 27, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Operation Leg: When the RAF airdropped a prosthetic leg into a German POW castle (71 points | 26 comments)
2. Bilinear down/upsampling, aligning pixel grids, and that infamous GPU half pixel (2021) (40 points | 1 comment)
3. Oliver Heaviside and the theory of transmission lines (2021) (164 points | 48 comments)

8. SiFive's P550 Microarchitecture (84 points | 21 comments)
9. A layoff fundamentally changed how I perceive work (610 points | 579 comments)
10. New Zealand welcomes digital nomads by loosening visitor visa rules (44 points | 11 comments)
11. Openhaystack: Build 'AirTags' – track Bluetooth devices via Apple's network (365 points | 78 comments)
12. Show HN: Making AR experiences is still painful – had to make my own editor (124 points | 25 comments)
13. Hedy: Textual programming made easy (168 points | 57 comments)

17. Hard numbers in the Wayland vs. X11 input latency discussion (536 points | 412 comments)

19. Using generative AI as part of historical research: three case studies (233 points | 195 comments)
20. Qwen2.5-1M: Deploy your own Qwen with context length up to 1M tokens (264 points | 94 comments)
21. Show HN: 3D printing giant things with a Python jigsaw generator (153 points | 37 comments)
22. C Is Not Suited to SIMD (2019) (53 points | 47 comments)
23. The impact of competition and DeepSeek on Nvidia (394 points | 216 comments)
24. Using the most unhinged AVX-512 instruction to make fastest phrase search algo (199 points | 50 comments)
25. Shunpo: Minimalist bash tool to make directory navigation a little bit faster (95 points | 40 comments)
26. So you wanna write Kubernetes controllers? (202 points | 101 comments)
27. Halliday AR(Not?)/AI Glasses (25 points | 9 comments)
28. No one is disrupting banks – at least not the big ones (195 points | 336 comments)
29. Autodesk partially restores old forum posts (94 points | 26 comments)
30. Marginalia – A search engine that prioritizes non-commercial content (490 points | 61 comments)
